definition[0]: an interactive computer program, television system etc allows you to communicate directly with it, and does things in reaction to your actions
example[2]: interactive teaching methods such as role playing
definition[2]: interactive television, computer software etc allows the person using it to affect what happens on the screen
example[3]: technology that will let people play the lottery via the internet, mobile phones and interactive television
example[4]: a world-wide publisher of interactive entertainment software.
